channel.title: Connection issues
channel.description: I was able to play the day before but now with every server i try to join the minecraft client says connection failed. I pinged all the ip adresses and the domains and they work. What could my problem possibly be?

item.title: Connection issues
item.dc:creator: @Batzilla Batzilla
item.description:
@Batzilla wrote:

Zans Minimap works fine with the Server as I have it don’t know about Invedit tho

Read full topic

try a fresh copy of mc see if it works

item.title: Connection issues
item.dc:creator: @noobs_are_ftw noobs are ftw
item.description:
@noobs_are_ftw wrote:

[quote=“Javerfire, post:6, topic:409538”][quote author=noobs are ftw link=topic=510818.msg3706848#msg3706848 date=1313093916]

I was able to play the day before but now with every server i try to join the minecraft client says connection failed. I pinged all the ip adresses and the domains and they work. What could my problem possibly be?

your using the cracked client am i correct? if you are then the servers you are trying are not allowing cracked clients

hmm, so i guess moparcraft doesn’t either i guess ill just have to buy it XD

you said every server u try so i thought you were talking about other servers srry lol moparcraft does allow them
[/quote]
hmm, kk does mopar use more than one port? if so i’ll try that[/quote]

no i think its the default cause i just type moparcraft.net and it conects

Read full topic

[/quote]

you said every server u try so i thought you were talking about other servers srry lol moparcraft does allow them[/quote]
